author: cnbc.com
title: California Based NVOCC Oceanstar Express Company, Inc. Merges With Seldat Distribution Inc.
text:
NEW YORK, March 5, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Seldat Distribution Inc., a leading provider of global supply chain services and technology solutions, announced today a new strategic partnership following a merger with Oceanstar Express Company, Inc. The newest addition to Seldat will strengthen the company's position in providing clients with time sensitive air and ocean freight as well as drayage services, with a focus on the food & beverage sector, project cargo, and roll-on/roll-off (RORO) wheeled cargo. The new company will be called Oceanstar by Seldat.
Oceanstar, headquartered in Southern California, will help guide customers across the globe with reliable freight forwarding, intermodal transportation, and sourcing services. With supply chain management expertise across a broad range of industries – from food to manufacturing to oil and gas, Oceanstar has continuously applied best practices developed from specializing in fragile, perishable goods to deliver everything it touches both intact and on time. "Oceanstar has been an industry pioneer for many years. I've followed their operations closely and am looking forward to them joining the Seldat family," says Daniel Dadoun, CEO of Seldat.
Oceanstar provides seamless global transportation and sourcing services. Oceanstar's clients can expect zero interruptions in ongoing operations and will enjoy additional services moving forward. Seldat's global supply chain network and technology solutions will provide new opportunities for customers seeking a competitive business advantage. "I'm very excited that Oceanstar is now a part of the Seldat family. Daniel's vision for the future will require the very best from all of us. The entire Oceanstar team is ready to make that vision a reality," says Paul Conolly, Oceanstar's founder and Managing Director. Paul will focus his efforts on strengthening carrier and customer relationships as well as guide the company toward future growth and innovation. Oceanstar by Seldat is committed to delivering the highest standards of service for all customer shipments.
About Seldat: Seldat Distribution Inc. provides innovative, scalable solutions and services that help companies in every link of the global supply chain grow and prosper. Our mission is to empower businesses and consumers worldwide to find, buy, and sell anything–without the limitations of borders and logistics challenges. Headquartered in South Plainfield, New Jersey, Seldat employs more than 2,200 people across North America, LATAM, EMEA, and APAC. To learn more, please visit www.seldatinc.com , tech.seldatinc.com , and oceanstarinc.com .
